name: Poemster
description:
POEMSTER

Write poems, earn money and spend it to customize your cabin into a perfect haven of poetic inspiration in this creativity fueling idle game.

Known bugs:

Clicking outside of the viewport makes it impossible to write or edit poems, making the game unplayable.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #40.

Credits:

jukeri - https://jukeri.itch.io/

Octahedron Software - https://octahedronsoftware.itch.io/
